detaileddescription.para: base64-js does basic base64 encoding/decoding in pure JS.
Many browsers already have base64 encoding/decoding functionality, but it is for text data, not all-purpose binary data.
Sometimes encoding/decoding binary data in the browser is useful, and that is what this module does.

sect1.title: install
sect1.para: npm install base64-js and var base64js = require('base64-js)`
For use in web browsers do:

para.ulink: Get supported base64-js with the Tidelift Subscription

sect1.title: methods
sect1.para: base64js has three exposed functions, byteLength, toByteArray and fromByteArray, which both take a single argument.

listitem.para: byteLength - Takes a base64 string and returns length of byte array
toByteArray - Takes a base64 string and returns a byte array
fromByteArray - Takes a byte array and returns a base64 string
